articles.description: Rasmus Hojlund's first Premier League goal marks the start of a new era at Manchester United, writes Simon Stone.
articles.title: 'Hojlund breaks duck to mark start of new Man Utd era'

articles.description: Liverpool signal their title ambitions by going top of the Premier League with a hard-fought victory at relegation-threatened Burnley.
articles.title: Liverpool go top after hard-fought win at Burnley

articles.description: Preview followed by live coverage of Tuesday's Premier League game between Newcastle United and Nottingham Forest.
articles.title: Newcastle United v Nottingham Forest team news

articles.description: Australia end a rain-affected opening day of the second Test against Pakistan in Melbourne on 187-3 as they chase victory for series win.
articles.title: Australia and Pakistan finely poised in second Test

articles.description: Rasmus Hojlund scores his first Premier League goal for Manchester United to complete a dramatic comeback against Aston Villa.
articles.title: Hojlund fires Man Utd to comeback win over Villa

articles.description: Sir Jim Ratcliffe says it will take "time and patience" to "bring sporting success" back to Manchester United.
articles.title: Success will take time and patience - Ratcliffe

articles.description: Dominic Solanke continues his fine scoring form as Bournemouth beat Fulham to earn a fourth Premier League win in a row.
articles.title: Solanke on target again as Bournemouth beat Fulham

articles.description: The Baltimore Ravens dominate the San Francisco 49ers on Christmas Day in the NFL, while the Las Vegas Raiders upset the Kansas City Chiefs and Philadelphia Eagles beat the New York Giants.
articles.title: Ravens dominate 49ers as Raiders upset Chiefs

articles.description: We speak to top athletes like Katarina Johnson-Thompson about how they juggle festive fun with training.
articles.title: Can Olympians treat themselves over the Christmas break?

articles.description: Luka Doncic reaches a milestone of 10,000 career points as the Dallas Mavericks beat the Phoenix Suns 128-114.
articles.title: NBA: Luka Doncic reaches 10,000 career points as Dallas Mavericks beat Phoenix Suns
